properties.entry: INSERT INTO MARKET ( MARKET_NO , MARKET_WRITER , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , MARKET_TITLE , MARKET_CONTENT , PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MARNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 2 , SEQ_MARNO.CURRVAL , ? )

SELECT MARKET_NO , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , MARKET_TITLE , MARKET_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') AS "PRICE" , (SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = M.MARKET_NO AND REF_BOARD_NO = 2 AND ROWNUM = 1) "TITLEIMG" FROM MARKET M WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MARKET_NO DESC
UPDATE MARKET SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE MARKET_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MARKET_NO , NICKNAME , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , MARKET_TITLE , MARKET_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') "PRICETXT" , PRICE , COUNT , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') "ENROLL_DATE" FROM MARKET JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MARKET_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE MARKET_NO = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BOARD_NO = 2 AND REF_NO = ?
UPDATE MARKET SET CATEGORY = ? , D_CATEGORY = ? , MARKET_TITLE = ? , MARKET_CONTENT =? , PRICE = ? WHERE MARKET_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 2 , ? , ? )
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_NO = ?
